whyMe.p1Prefix: Most websites fail not because they look bad, but because they are
whyMe.p1Strong: impossible to extend, poorly maintained, and expensive to fix later
whyMe.p2: I design websites and systems with a simple question in mind: will this still work well three years from now?
whyMe.p3Line1: If you’re only looking for the fastest and cheapest template, I may not be the right choice.
whyMe.p3Line2: But if you want a technical partner who grows with your business, I’m someone you can rely on.
